metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3155 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the CORBA ORB component in Sun GlassFish Enterprise Server 2.1.1, Oracle GlassFish Server 3.0.1 and 3.1.2, and Sun Java System Application Server 8.1 and 8.2 allows remote attackers to affect availability, related to CORBA ORB.

criterions.comment: glassfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
